title: War Picks
content:
War Picks in Baldur's Gate 3

Name Damage Special Properties Weapon Actions Pickaxe 1d8 Piercing None Crippling StrikePiercing StrikeWeakening Strike War Pick 1d8 Piercing None Crippling StrikePiercing StrikeWeakening Strike Deep Delver 1d8 Piercing Dig Deep: Inflicts Shattered on hit. When attacking a Shattered target, deal an additional 1d4 Piercing damage.
